settings.tableSortMetricName: Number of failed Fetch requests per second

query.alias: Number of Fetch failures per second
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`kafka_topics`:(AVG(`FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.Count`) AS `Number of Fetch failures per second`) { `host` = '#{host}' }")

query.alias: Number of failed Produce requests per second
query.q: NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE("M::`kafka_topics`:(AVG(`FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.Count`) AS `Number of failed Produce requests per second`) { `host` = '#{host}' }")

colors.key: Average number of expansions per second
colors.name: Average number of expansions per second

settings.tableSortMetricName: Average number of expansions per second

query.alias: Average number of expansions per second
query.q: M::`kafka_replica_manager`:(AVG(`IsrExpandsPerSec.Count`) AS `Average number of expansions per second`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Average number of shrinks per second
query.q: M::`kafka_replica_manager`:(AVG(`IsrShrinksPerSec.Count`) AS `Average number of shrinks per second`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

colors.key: Minimum number of failed ISR partitions
colors.name: Minimum number of failed ISR partitions

query.alias: Below the minimum number of ISR partitions
query.q: M::`kafka_replica_manager`:(AVG(`UnderMinIsrPartitionCount.Value`) AS `Below the minimum number of ISR partitions`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

fields.alias: Minimum number of failed ISR partitions
